question.body: Which of the following is the purpose of fibrinolysis?

multiple_choice.choice: Continue the positive feedback loop of hemostasis
Continue the negative feedback loop of hemostasis
Process of breaking down a clot

response.feedback: Incorrect. The positive feedback loop ends when the blood loss has stopped. Fibrinolysis occurs after this point.
Incorrect. The process of hemostasis is a positive feedback loop that moves the body away from the normal.
Incorrect. The process of building a clot is coagulation.
Correct. The process of breaking down a clot is fibrinolysis.
